products.title: Gibson Egg Shell Roller Blind
products.metadescription: The gibson egg shell is a light, bright fabric. Use this to help lighten a room and help to make it feel bigger. The light colour will pair with any decor and this blind is suitable for any room in the home - especially bathrooms. The 100% pvc fabric i
products.productdescription: The gibson egg shell is a light, bright fabric. Use this to help lighten a room and help to make it feel bigger. The light colour will pair with any decor and this blind is suitable for any room in the home - especially bathrooms. The 100% pvc fabric is fully waterproof, meaning that it can be installed right next to a shower without worry about damaging the fabric. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.
